name: Fresh Goat Cheese and Fennel Crumble
description: Turn simple vegetable dishes into something truly special – savoury crumbles will change the way you think about vegetables!

ingredients.name: goat cheese or low-fat cream cheese

preparation: Lightly spray a 9” x 13” baking dish with vegetable oil.
Heat a frying pan over medium heat. Add oil and fennel. Cook until lightly golden. Stir in water. Season with Sea Salt and Black Pepper.
Spoon into prepared baking dish. Top with goat cheese.
In a medium bowl, combine remaining dry ingredients and cut in butter until crumbly.
Sprinkle topping over base. Bake for 25 minutes, or until lightly golden.
tips: Serve as a side dish with chicken and fish, or as a delicious main course accompanied by a crisp, satisfying salad.
